languages.text: "Что-то произошло, и Дан изменился? Его ведь так зовут, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "Но что-то произошло, и Дан изменился? Его ведь так зовут, верно?".

languages.text: "Something happened, and Daen changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"
languages.original_text: "Что-то произошло, и Дан изменился? Его ведь так зовут, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "Something happened, and Dan changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"
"Something happened, and Dan changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"
"But something happened, and Dan changed? That is his name, yes?"
"Something happened, and Daen changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"
"Something happened, and Daen changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"
"Something happened, and Dan changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"
"Something happened, and Dan changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"
"Something happened, and Daen changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"

languages.text: “后来发生了某些事情，达恩也变了，是吧？达恩就是他的本名，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "Something happened, and Daen changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"

traits.locale_text: “后来发生了某些事情，达恩也变了，是吧？达恩就是他的本名，没错吧？”
“后来发生了某些事情，丹也变了，是吧？丹就是他的本名，没错吧？”

languages.text: «Ocurrió algo y Daen ya no fue el mismo, ¿verdad? Se llama así, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "Something happened, and Daen changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"

traits.locale_text: «Ocurrió algo y Daen ya no fue el mismo, ¿verdad? Se llama así, ¿no?».
«Ocurrió algo y Dan ya no fue el mismo, ¿verdad? Se llama así, ¿no?».

languages.text: "Bir şey oldu ve Daen değişti, değil mi? Adı Dan mi demiştin?"
languages.original_text: "Something happened, and Daen changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir şey oldu ve Daen değişti, değil mi? Adı Dan mi demiştin?"
"Bir şey oldu ve Dan değişti, değil mi? Adı Dan mi demiştin?"

languages.text: 「何かが起こり、ダンが変わったということか？それが彼の名前だな？」
languages.original_text: "Something happened, and Daen changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"

traits.locale_text: 「何かが起こり、ダンが変わったということか？それが彼の名前だな？」
「何かが起こり、ダンが変わったということか？それが彼の名前だな？」

languages.text: « Il s'est passé quelque chose, et depuis, Daen a changé, je me trompe ? C'est bien son nom ? »
languages.original_text: "Something happened, and Daen changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"

traits.locale_text: « Il s'est passé quelque chose, et depuis, Daen a changé, je me trompe ? C'est bien son nom ? »
« Il s'est passé quelque chose, et depuis, Dan a changé, je me trompe ? C'est bien son nom ? »

languages.text: "Es ist etwas passiert und Daen hat sich verändert, nicht wahr? So heißt er doch?"
languages.original_text: "Something happened, and Daen changed, did he not? That is his name, yes?"

traits.locale_text: "Es ist etwas passiert und Daen hat sich verändert, nicht wahr? So heißt er doch?"
"Es ist etwas passiert und Dan hat sich verändert, nicht wahr? So heißt er doch?"
